## SVF class

Multi-type state variable filter w/ trapezoidal integration, after Andrew Simper.

Reference:

- https://cytomic.com/files/dsp/SvfLinearTrapOptimised2.pdf - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trapezoidal\_rule

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SVF extends AProc<number, number> implements IReset 
```
